sen.j: 南都鏡神社（なんとかがみじんじゃ）とは、奈良県奈良市にある神社である。
sen.e: Nantokagami-jinja Shrine is located in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
Nantokagami-jinja Shrine is located in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
Nantokagami-jinja Shrine is located in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 藤原広嗣を祭神とする。
sen.e: The enshrined deity is FUJIWARA no Hirotsugu.
The enshrined deity is FUJIWARA no Hirotsugu.
The enshrined deity is FUJIWARA no Hirotsugu.
Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 大同元年（806年）に新薬師寺の鎮守として境内南側にて創建された。
sen.e: The shrine was founded as Chinju (local Shinto deity) of Shin-Yakushi-ji Temple in the south side of its precincts in 806.
The shrine was built in the south side of Shin-Yakushi-ji Temple's grounds in 806 in dedication to the Chinju (local Shinto deity).
sen.cmt: founded > built. precints > grounds. as > in dedication to.
sen.e: The shrine was built in the south side of Shin-Yakushi-ji Temple's grounds in 806 in dedication to the Chinju (local Shinto deity).

sen.j: 現在の本殿は、延享三年（1746年）に春日大社の第三殿を譲り受け、移築されたものである。
sen.e: The main shrine building was the third building of Kasugataisha Shrine given and was relocated in 1746.
The main shrine building that stands today was relocated in 1746 to make room for the third building of Kasugataisha Shrine.
sen.cmt: 現在の>that stands today. given > relocated to make room for.
sen.e: The main shrine building that stands today was relocated in 1746 to make room for the third building of Kasuga-taisha Shrine.

sen.j: 一間社春日造り建築で、奈良市指定文化財となっている。
sen.e: It is built in Ikkensha Kasuga-zukuri style (shrines built to the width of just a single bay at the gable ends) and is a cultural property designated by Nara City.
It is built in Ikkensha Kasuga-zukuri style (built to the width of just a single bay at the gable ends) and has been designated a cultural asset by Nara City.
It is built in Ikkensha Kasuga-zukuri style (built to the width of just a single bay at the gable ends) and has been designated a cultural asset by Nara City.
Directions
Directions
Directions

sen.j: 近鉄奈良駅から奈良交通バス「中循環」で「破石町」下車東へ徒歩10分
sen.e: Take the Nara Kotsu Bus 'Naka-junkan' from the Kintetsu Nara Station to 'Wariishi-cho' and walk towards the east for 10 minutes.
Take the Nara Kotsu Bus 'Naka-junkan' from Kintetsu Nara Station to 'Wariishi-cho' and walk eastwards for 10 minutes.
Take the Nara Kotsu Bus 'Naka-junkan' from Kintetsu Nara Station to 'Wariishi-cho' and walk eastwards for 10 minutes.

sen.j: JR奈良駅から奈良交通バス「市内循環」又は「中循環」で「破石町」下車東へ徒歩10分
sen.e: Take the Nara Kotsu Bus 'Shinai-junkan' or 'Naka-junkan' from the JR Nara Station to 'Wariishi-cho' and walk towards the east for 10 minutes.
Take the Nara Kotsu Bus 'Shinai-junkan' or 'Naka-junkan' from the JR Nara Station to 'Wariishi-cho' and walk eastwards for 10 minutes.
Take the Nara Kotsu Bus 'Shinai-junkan' or 'Naka-junkan' from the JR Nara Station to 'Wariishi-cho' and walk eastwards for 10 minutes.
